review.reviewBody: These folks make the BEST pizza around, bar none! Always arrives super hot and really fresh.

Do not order the baked ravioli, it's just Chef Boyardee. I don't mean it's low quality like canned pasta, I don't mean it tastes similar to canned pasta, I'm saying that between childhood, camping, and tough times in my 20s, I'm far more familiar with canned pasta than I want to be. The baked ravioli IS Chef Boyardee. They have the gall to serve you a couple cans of Chef Boyardee with some cheese melted on top, and charge you $16 for that nonsense.

Other people have made this complaint, and the owners deny it. They claim to have their own recipe. If so, it's uncanny the way that not only is the taste identical, but they've also perfectly duplicated the texture of the mechanically separated formed meat and the soggy, gummy pasta. "Bragging" about this accomplishment seems like a worse indictment of the chef's skill than just admitting to ripping off customers with canned food.

Other than that, the pizza and wings are the same pre-made stuff you'll find at any other hole in the wall 2 for 1 place. I find that acceptable, but I feel too ripped off over the ravioli to ever order from here again.
Ordered a Submarine and didn't even receive it even though it's on there menu
Not ready when stated.  driver had to wait at restaurant for 15min.
